name: Time Thieves
description:
Once there were time when… well, once there were time. Time Thieves has come to steal time and to do so they need to freeze time to get time after that to themselves. We need your help! Go to the Orb and let the time flow free again. You need a magic gun for that. It’s a very powerful gun so we keep it in safe. Solve the puzzles to get that gun. You are our only hope so good Luck!

Code:
Henri Heikkilä - Sir Henry
Tero Joronen - Kirjoittamaton

2D Art 
Satu Anttila - Story Games

3D Modelling
Elin Masar - Ninuni

Controls
Left Click - Hover object/Shoot
Right Click - Drop Objects
E - Interact
Enter - Submit/Skip
Spacebar - Jump

Finnish College Game Jam 4
